rukus.text: Let non those disbelieve think they get it they nunquam escape

Vos prepare them totus power vos muster totus equipment vos mobilize ut vos frighten enemies DEUS tuus enemies alias prout others qui non known to vos; DEUS knows them! Whatever vos spend causa de DEUS testimentum repaid vos generously parvus injustice
they resort pax shall vos put tuus trust DEUS! He est Hearer Omniscient
they want deceive vos tunc DEUS testimentum suffice vos! He help vos cum His support ac cum believers
(He reconciled hearts believers). Habet vos spent totus moneta terra vos non reconcile their hearts Deus perfecit reconcile them! He est Almighty Wise
O vos prophet sufficient vos est DEUS believers subsequentis vos
